A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
So disappointed!
No payout for Luke\, no payout for Rey\, no payout for Snoke.

The whole setup of the first film is wasted\, the last 3rd of this film was for nothing. Del Toro's character was wasted\, turned out to be a co-murderous douche.
This movie was such a waste and a letdown.

The only way it can be saved in the next movie is if Rey wakes up and it was all a dream\, dallas style.

So disappointed!

I paid for my whole family to see it in IMAX3D\, with concessions\, totaling $120\, all to watch the biggest rip-off of a movie that had access to the best minds in the world and the biggest budget. Thanks Disney for wasting our time\, money and a one shot opportunity to enrich and further the Star Wars narrative.
